tweet:
The “religion” a lot of these people practice is bullshit! 
This is murder! Broad daylight murder! No matter what she may have said or not said. In fact even if she said it! They killed that girl for nothing. A zoo has some sense of order self… Nigeria is not a place! https://t.co/2Gyabavjys

Even if you think Nigeria is a zoo, still go and register for your voter's card. Since you have not yet gotten your visa to exit the zoo, make your voice be heard. Vote in people that will help you exit the so called zoo.

https://t.co/WeLpuFX3Jr
The people whose monies are being used are more concerned about those who say Nigeria is a zoo. https://t.co/4Rgs1XiYBm
@OluwakayodeKomo Aren't they in better position to call Nigeria zoo? They see, experience and partake in the "zooness" happening

You have no busines telling people how to express their pains. Respect Nigeria all you want. It is you. Let others do them.
In the meantime, remember that a young Nigerian just like you is currently in the morgue because Nigeria was worse than a zoo. The next victim can be ME! https://t.co/QsC38zLYPr

Many of those whose accounts were blocked are in their early 20s. Nigeria shamelessly blocked their accounts because they demanded that @PoliceNG should stop profiling & killing them and you are more concerned that they called Nigeria a zoo?
Have you put yourself in their shoes?

Calling Nigeria a zoo is actually a compliment. It is worse. Killings don't happen in zoos indiscriminately. It is more like a jungle but then killings in jungles is for a purpose. Nigeria is in a category of itself where killings happen indiscriminately with no purpose. https://t.co/of6q8CrL0e
